channel.title: ip on 树深时间录
channel.description: Recent content in ip on 树深时间录

item.title: Linux 命令 —— ip
item.description: ip 显示/操纵路由、设备、策略路由、隧道。 概要 ip [ OPTIONS ] OBJECT { COMMAND | help } ip [ -force ] -batch filename OBJECT := { link | address | addrlabel | route | rule | neigh | ntable | tunnel | tuntap | maddress | mroute | mrule | monitor | xfrm | netns | l2tp | tcp_metrics } OPTIONS := { -V[ersion] | -h[uman-readable] | -s[tatistics] | -r[esolve] | -f[amily] { inet | inet6 | ipx | dnet | link } | -o[neline] | -n[etns] name | -a[ll] | -c[olor] } OBJECT:
